content:
after local elections Tuesday Champaign County Clerk Mark Shelden acknowledged that voters in some places ran into difficulties at the polls and viewing results on the Web PERIOD

Shelden said those looking for results on the county clerks Web site saw delays due to technical issues PERIOD

The Web site went down yesterday PERIOD We had problems getting it back up and getting the results posted Shelden said PERIOD

He added that some voters may have had to deal with a ballot shortage when they went to cast their vote Tuesday PERIOD

I know we had to bring ballots out to  precincts Shelden said PERIOD
title: County clerk talks election issues - The Daily Illini
name: University of Illinois Urbana Champaign
